perturbation.original_text: element 5 RESERVES THE RIGHT TO MODIFY AND TO SUPPLEMENT THESE GENERAL TERMS AND CONDITIONS AT ANY TIME. THE CURRENT VERSION WILL BE MAINTAINED FOR VIEWING AS A HYPERLINK ON element 5's WEB SITE IN THE CONTROL PANEL. MOREOVER, element 5 WILL ANNOUNNOUNCE ANY CHANGES TO THESE TERMS VIA E- MAIL. WHITHIN 14 DAYS OF THE ANNOUNCEMENT OF CHANGED PARTICIPATION TERMS, AFFILIATE AND SOFTWARE PUBLISHER MAY OBJECT TO SUCH CHANGES. IF NO OBJECTION IS RECEIVED DURING THIS TIME, THE PARTICIPANT IS DEEMED TO HAVE ACCEPTED THE CHANGES AND THEY WILL BECOME PART OF THE EXISTING RELATIONS UNDER THE AGREEMENT.
perturbation.changed_text: element 5 RESERVES THE RIGHT TO MODIFY AND TO SUPPLEMENT THESE GENERAL TERMS AND CONDITIONS AT ANY TIME. THE CURRENT VERSION WILL BE MAINTAINED FOR VIEWING AS A HYPERLINK ON element 5's WEB SITE IN THE CONTROL PANEL. MOREOVER, element 5 WILL ANNOUNNOUNCE ANY CHANGES TO THESE TERMS VIA E- MAIL. All changes to the general terms and conditions are effective immediately upon announcement via e-mail, with no right to objection from either the Affiliate or the Software Publisher. Continued participation in the program constitutes acceptance of the modified terms.
perturbation.explanation: The original clause allows a 14-day objection period for changes. The modified clause eliminates this objection period, making all changes immediately effective, thus creating a direct contradiction.
perturbation.location: IV. General terms § 2 Changes to these provisions

perturbation.original_text: Either party may cancel this Agreement at any time, with or without supplying a reason, through written notification or by making suitable settings in the respective Control Panel.
perturbation.changed_text: Either party may cancel this Agreement at any time, with or without supplying a reason, only through written notification delivered via certified mail with return receipt requested. Cancellation through settings in the respective Control Panel is not permitted.
perturbation.explanation: The original text allows cancellation through either written notification or settings in the control panel. The modified version restricts cancellation only to written notification via certified mail, explicitly prohibiting cancellation through the control panel, creating a contradiction.
perturbation.location: IV. General terms § 7 Agreement period / Cancellation

perturbation.original_text: The parties exclude mutual liability for slightly negligent violation of obligations in connection with this agreement, with the exception of § 16 and § 5 (3) of this agreement. This includes in particular the liability exclusion for lost profit, the loss of data or interruption to or errors in the operation of the Web site of the Affiliate.
perturbation.changed_text: The parties exclude mutual liability for slightly negligent violation of obligations in connection with this agreement. Liability is not excluded for lost profit, the loss of data or interruption to or errors in the operation of the Web site of the Affiliate.
perturbation.explanation: The original clause excludes liability for slightly negligent violations, explicitly including lost profit and data loss. The modified clause removes the examples previously included in the exclusion. The original version's exclusion of those specific items directly contradicts the revised text's inclusion of them, creating uncertainty regarding liability for those losses.
perturbation.location: IV. General terms § 6 Limitation of liability
